PrimaryLoginLink.Title: Use this link to sign in {{ template "app.name" }}
PrimaryLoginLink.Body: Please click the button below to sign in to {{ template "app.name" }}.
PrimaryLoginLink.Disclaimer: If you didn't trigger a login, please ignore this email.

PrimaryOOBEmail.Title: Log in to {{ template "app.name" }}
PrimaryOOBEmail.Body: Please use the following one-time password to complete the log in process.
PrimaryOOBEmail.Disclaimer: Don't share it with anyone. If you didn't trigger a login, please ignore this email.

SecondaryOOBEmail.Title: Log in to {{ template "app.name" }}

SecondaryOOBEmail.Disclaimer: Don't share it with anyone. If you didn't login, please ignore this email.

ForgotPassword.Title: Reset Password
ForgotPassword.Body: You have requested to reset your password on {{ template "app.name" }}. To do so, click the button below.
ForgotPassword.Disclaimer: If you didn't request a reset, please ignore this email.

ForgotPasswordOOBEmail.Title: Reset Password
ForgotPasswordOOBEmail.Body: Please use the following one-time password to reset your password on {{ template "app.name" }}.
ForgotPasswordOOBEmail.Disclaimer: Don't share it with anyone. If you didn't request a reset, please ignore this email.

VerificationEmail.Title: Email Verification

VerificationEmail.Disclaimer: Don't share it with anyone. If you didn't sign in or sign up, please ignore this email.

ChangePassword.Title: Your Password Has Been Changed: Here is Your New Password
ChangePassword.Body: Your password for {{ template "app.name" }} has been changed by an administrator.
ChangePassword.Label: Your new password:
ChangePassword.Disclaimer: For security reasons, we recommend that you log in and update your password to something more memorable.
ChangePassword.Tip1: • Never share your password with anyone.
ChangePassword.Tip2: • Use a unique password for each of your online accounts.

ChangePasswordTXT.Title: Your Password Has Been Changed: Here is Your New Password
ChangePasswordTXT.Body: Your password for {{ template "app.name" }} has been changed by an administrator.
ChangePasswordTXT.Label: Your new password:
ChangePasswordTXT.Disclaimer: For security reasons, we recommend that you log in and update your password to something more memorable.
ChangePasswordTXT.Tip1: - Never share your password with anyone.
ChangePasswordTXT.Tip2: - Use a unique password for each of your online accounts.

CreateUser.Title: Let's Get Started with Your {{ template "app.name" }} Account!
CreateUser.Body: We're excited to have you on board with {{ template "app.name" }}. Here's all you need to set up your account and get started.
CreateUser.Instruction: Login to {{ template "app.name" }} with your email and temporary password. Please change your password after login.
